Mobile Point-of-Sale

Providers can create invoices and charge patients right in the room. Once you load your inventory, prices, and discounts into Aesthetic Record, it takes less than a minute to check-out. Our POS provides you with advanced sales and inventory reporting, so you know important metrics in real-time.
